text.tspan: Death rates from different causes, United States
Reported annual death rate from different causes per 100,000 people, based on the underlying cause listed on

path.id: Neuropsychiatric conditions and drug use disorders
outline__Neuropsychiatric conditions and drug use disorders
line__Neuropsychiatric conditions and drug use disorders

text.tspan: Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized. All deaths in a country may not have
been registered with a cause of death. Only a selection of categories are shown.
